name: yorkshire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area of northern England that includes the counties (= areas with their own local government) of North Yorkshire, South Yorkshire, East Yorkshire, and West Yorkshire: He was born in Bramhope, near Leeds in Yorkshire. Hockney loved to paint his native Yorkshire countryside.
More examplesFewer examplesHis dad was a farmer in Yorkshire.The pub serves seven beers including Tetleys from Yorkshire and Guinness from Ireland.The Australian team played Britain in the Yorkshire town of Ilkley.
